When I played dis gam I feel rely great. I have not stopped playing for 254.1 hours streaght. I have a chair that has a hole in the bottom that I can poop and pee in because peeing In bottles is Gross. This game tingls my brain receptor analyzers very nicely. I love playing the counter strike global offensive very much. It is much better than that stupid LOL summoners rift game that everyone else plays. League of legends is very much inferior and it makes people go crazy.  People who play summoner rift league of L are stupid and have a very smooth or no brain at all. I think everyone should play counter strike global offensive more. Valorant is similar but I don't like it because it was made by the same people that made League of L, Summoner rift, legends of Renteria, team fight tactics, Wild rift, ruined king, hextech    mayhem, C9nver/gence, song of nunu, rising thunder, and Project L. L for Loser, L for stupid, L for League of Legends.

Counter strike global offensive is a tactical, strategical, skillful, Video game where you need to have to use all your skills that you have gained in your life. People who play counter strike global offensive are strong, ambitious, and hyper intelligent people. People who play League of L are small, weak, and are not very nice. 

Everytime Counter strike global offensive gets an update. A deep dislike is drawn to me. That "play" button so far In the distance. I imagine the tantilizing green of the play button, but I must wait an insufferable 2.4 minutes for the video game to update. 2.4 Minutes of our lives wasted just to download an operation that I or anyone else will never use.

This is one reason I do not like counter strike global offensive but do not even get me started on League of losers called the people that play League of Legends.

The amount of cheaters as well as one of the worlds worst matchmaking systems and ranking system makes this a pain in the *** the gameplay is great, but the frustration over Valves absolute disregard for anti-cheat is horrendous, this is also for paid gameplay.

Jogo bom, gastei algumas horas nele, o único problema que a cada 5 partidas 5 delas haviam um respeitável homem argentino ou paraguaio que se referia á mim como um ser que conhecemos como macaco confuso eu lhe chamava de projeto de europeu falido.
